Know Ideas

Book Design, Print Production

Grey Vaisius and I wrote a 130 page book about Internet culture. Interactive features of the book included: Gate folds, French folds, layers of acetate, and mirror paper â€” a poetic representation of the screen. The books is a melding of medium and message.
